name: Schoolwise Student List
query:
select
    school_code as "TCIL Code",
    udise as "UDISE Code",
    name_of_school as "School Name",
    district as "District",
    block as "Block",
    pin_code as "Pin Code",
    class_vbg as "Class V Students",
    class_vibg as "Class VI Students",
    class_viibg as "Class VII Students",
    class_viiibg as "Class VIII Students",
    sum(class_vbg + class_vibg + class_viibg + class_viiibg) as "Total Students Students"
from
    `tabSchool Survey Form`
Group BY school_code
